categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars: The Old Republic
Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Darth Kallomena was a female Sith Lord living during the Galactic War. Some time after stopping the Children of the Emperor, the Barsen'thor came into contact with Kallomena while pursuing Torwin Vehl on Bothawui.

After a skirmish with the Barsen'thor, Kallomena was defeated and presumed that the Force was teaching her a lesson. She then allied with the Barsen'thor and aided in the search for Vehl, which eventually led Kallomena to the planets Sleheyron and Makeb.
Darth Kallomena appears in the game files for Star Wars: The Old Republic under cnv.exp.01.bothawui.class.jedi_consular.darth_kallomena_unnamed.

She was intended to appear as part of a fourth chapter in the Jedi Consular class story, which would have been released in the first expansion for the game. The content was eventually scrapped, and the remnants of the project were retooled into Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel. Kallomena does not appear in the live version of the game.
